title: App box - select
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Apps page
AND App boxes have appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks or taps on an app image
OR user clicks or taps on an app name
custom_expected:
THEN a new tab opens
AND in that new tab a page loads that is relevant to the app that was selected
AND the new page is a login page

title: OBSOLETE - Search function: click or tap
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Apps page
AND Search field has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps inside the field
custom_expected:
THEN a flashing vertical line appears in the field
AND the line is to the left of and touching the S in Search

title: OBSOLETE - Search function: no result
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Apps page
AND user has clicked or tapped inside the Search field
custom_steps: WHEN user types characters that do not match an app name
custom_expected:
THEN all app boxes disappear
AND Search field and Filter dropdown remain
AND the typed characters remain in the Search field
AND a message appears above the Apps header
AND the message reads: No records matching the criteria 
AND the message is dark blue

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19082)

title: OBSOLETE - Apps Filter function: open
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Apps page
AND the Filter dropdown box has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks anywhere on the dropdown box
custom_expected:
THEN dropdown menu appears
AND top item reads (with colon): Filter By Category:
AND top item only has white font and a blue background
AND all other menu items have black font and gray background
AND menu items are alphabetized
AND menu list is:
MLB App
MLB Benefit
MLB Utility

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19451)

title: OBSOLETE - Apps Filter function: close
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Apps page
AND user has clicked on the Filter dropdown box
AND dropdown menu has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks anywhere on the page (except on a dropdown menu item)
custom_expected:
THEN dropdown box automatically closes
AND dropdown menu disappears

title: OBSOLETE - Apps Filter function: hover
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Apps page
AND user has tapped or clicked on the Filter dropdown box
AND the dropdown menu has appeared
custom_steps: When user hovers cursor over a dropdown menu item
custom_expected:
THEN blue background appears behind menu item being hovered over
AND label of that menu item changes from black to white

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19458)

title: OBSOLETE - Apps Filter function: click or tap
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Apps page
AND user has clicked or tapped on the Filter dropdown box
AND dropdown menu has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on any dropdown menu item (except Filter By Category)
custom_expected:
THEN Filter dropdown menu disappears
AND Filter dropdown box shows the selected category name
AND app boxes disappear
AND a new grid of app boxes appears
AND all app boxes have the category label that was selected
AND no app with another category label appears in the new grid

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19085)

title: OBSOLETE - Apps Filter function: click or tap Filter By Category:
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Apps page
AND user has clicked on Filter dropdown box
AND user has clicked on an item in the dropdown menu
AND grid of app boxes has changed to show only apps with the selected category
AND dropdown menu has disappeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks or taps anywhere on the Filter dropdown box
AND dropdown menu appears
AND user clicks or taps on the item Filter By Category:
custom_expected:
THEN dropdown menu disappears
AND app boxes disappears
AND new app boxes appear
AND the new app boxes includes all the apps
AND dropdown menu disappears
AND dropdown box shows the Filter By Category: item

title: OBSOLETE - Search function: type and enter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Apps page
AND user has clicked or tapped inside the Search field
custom_steps:
WHEN user types whole words
OR user types partial words
AND user hits Return/Go/Enter
custom_expected:
THEN apps on the page are replaced by the relevant apps
AND the apps are relevant because their app names contain the sequence of characters typed into the Search field
AND the characters remain in the Search field

title: App box - hover
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Apps page
AND App boxes have loaded
custom_steps:
WHEN user hovers cursor over an App box image
OR user hovers cursor over an app name
custom_expected: THEN cursor changes from arrow to pointing hand

title: App box - hover over app name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Apps page
AND App boxes have appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user hovers cursor over an app name

title: App box - hover no result
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Apps page
AND App boxes have appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user hovers cursor over a category label
OR user hovers cursor over a description
custom_expected: THEN cursor does not change from an arrow -- those elements are not linked.

title: Global Apps appearance, between 768px and 991px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport between 768px and 991px
AND user is on the Global Apps page
custom_expected:
THEN page has a white box
AND above the white box is a dark blue, all-caps header that reads: Apps
AND the header is left aligned with the left border of the white box
AND inside the box at the top is a Search field
AND inside the Search field is a gray magnifying glass icon and a gray label that reads: Search
AND below the Search field is the Filter dropdown box
AND the dropdown box has a black boldface all-caps label that reads (with colon): Filter By Category:
AND below the dropdown box are 2 columns of App boxes
AND the left borders of the Search field, the dropdown box, and the left column of App boxes all align
AND the right borders of the Search field, the dropdown box, and the right column of App boxes all align
AND the boxes are top and bottom aligned with each other
AND no element on the page overlaps another

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19078)

title: Global Apps appearance, at or below 767px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 767px
AND user is on Global Apps page
custom_expected:
THEN page has a white box
AND above the white box is a dark blue, all-caps header that reads: Apps
AND the header is left aligned with the left border of the white box
AND inside the box at the top is a Search field
AND inside the Search field is a gray magnifying glass icon and a gray label that reads: Search
AND below the Search field is the Filter dropdown box
AND the dropdown box has a black boldface all-caps label that reads (with colon): Filter By Category:
AND below the dropdown box are App boxes
AND the left borders of the Search field, the dropdown box, and App boxes all align
AND the right borders of the Search field, the dropdown box, and App boxes all align
AND no element on the page overlaps another

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19079)

title: App box - appearance at or above 768px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 768px
AND user is on Global Apps page
AND App boxes have appeared
custom_expected:
THEN each App box has a white background and a gray border
AND each App box has 4 elements: image, app name, category label, description
AND the image is on the left
AND the other 3 elements are vertically stacked to the right
AND the other 3 elements are left aligned
AND the image is a logo that relates to the app name
AND each app name is dark blue, bold-faced, underlined, and initial capped
AND each category label is in white, all-caps font with a dark blue box behind it
AND each description is dark blue
AND any long description that is cut off ends with an ellipses ...

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19622)

title: App box - appearance at or below 767px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 767px
AND user is on the Global Apps page
AND Apps boxes have appeared
custom_expected:
THEN each App box has a white background and a gray border
AND each App box has 4 elements: image, app name, category label, description
AND the image is at the top of the box
AND the other 3 elements are vertically stacked beneath the image
AND the other 3 elements are left aligned
AND the image is a logo that relates to the app name
AND each app name is dark blue, bold-faced, underlined, and initial capped
AND each category label is in white, all-caps font with a dark blue box behind it
AND each description is dark blue
AND any long description that is cut off ends with an ellipses ...

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19623)

title: Global Apps - appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
AND user is on the Global Apps page
custom_expected:
THEN page looks like the photo below
AND long descriptions have ellipses (they do not expand the cards).

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19843)

title: Test responsiveness: no gaps in cards
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a desktop platform
custom_steps:
WHEN user decreases the viewport
AND WHEN user expands the viewport
custom_expected:
THEN all elements continue to appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other in any viewport
AND images stay proportionate (not stretched or squished)
AND all elements function as expected
AND there are no gaps as in the photo below:

Note: Some app logos will be stretched or squished, this is expected.
If ALL the app logos are stretched or squished, that is an issue.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19841)

title: Test mobile
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is using a mobile device
custom_expected:
THEN all elements appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other
AND all elements function as expected
